metadata.title: USN-3009-1 -- Dnsmasq vulnerability
metadata.description: Edwin Török discovered that Dnsmasq incorrectly handled certain CNAME responses. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause Dnsmasq to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3009-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  dnsmasq - 2.75-1ubuntu0.16.04.1 dnsmasq-utils - 2.75-1ubuntu0.16.04.1 dnsmasq-base - 2.75-1ubuntu0.16.04.1 No subscription required
